name: Name
setProfileExplanation: Profiles are visible to your contacts, groups, and anyone that has your contact code.
qrCodeExplanation: Your QR code is not visible on your profile. Share it only with people you trust.
shareCodeWarning: Share your QR code only with people you trust. When you share it, others will be able to see your profile and start chatting with you.
scanQrCodeOfYourContact: Scan the QR code from your contact's device.
acceptRequestDescription: Review requests carefully. Profile names are chosen by their account owner and aren't verified.
rejectRequestDescription: This contact request will be permanently rejected.
contactRequestBanner: Let **{{name}}** message you and share your name and photo with them? They won't know you've seen their message until you accept.
profileNamesExplanation: on Dash Chat are chosen by their account holder.
profileNamesCautiousTip: Be cautious of accounts that impersonate others
profileNamesPersonalInfoTip: Don't share personal information with people you don't know
securityTipsSubtitle: Be careful when accepting message requests from people you don't know. Watch out for:
securityTipFakeNamesDescription: Dash Chat will never contact you for your registration code or PIN. Be cautious of requests that impersonate others. Profile names are chosen by their account holder and aren't verified.
securityTipCryptoScamsDescription: If someone you don't know messages about cryptocurrency (like Bitcoin) or a financial opportunity, be careful—it's likely spam.
securityTipVagueMessagesDescription: Spammers often start with a simple message like “Hi” to draw you in. If you respond they may engage you further.
securityTipLinksDescription: Be careful of messages from people you don't know that have links to websites. Never visit links from people you don't trust.
securityTipFakeBusinessesDescription: Be careful of businesses or government agencies contacting you. Messages involving tax agencies, couriers, and more can be spam.
noContactsYet: You don't have any contacts yet.
noChatsYet: You don't have any chats yet.
areYouSureRemoveMember: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
areYouSureDemote: Are you sure you want to demote this member from the administrator role?
areYouSurePromote: Are you sure you want to promote this member to the administrator role?
areYouSureLeaveGroup: Are you sure you want to leave this group?
areYouSureDeleteGroup: Are you sure you want to delete this group?
deleteAccountWarning: This will permanently delete your account and all your data. This action cannot be undone.
areYouSureDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
errorDeleteAccount: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
errorCreateContactCode: Failed to create contact code. Please try again.
errorAddContact: Failed to add contact. Please try again.
errorAddContactProfileRequired: Please create your profile before adding contacts.
errorSetProfile: Failed to save profile. Please try again.
errorScanningQrCode: Failed to scan QR code. Please try again.
